name: Jerome Knopp
content: Home | Science and Engineering | University of Missouri - Kansas City University of Missouri-Kansas city School of Science and Engineering Science and Engineering Apply Visit Get Info Find an Area of Study That's Right for You! We offer a variety of degrees in science and engineering programs that use cutting-edge technology, experimentation, learning and discovery to prepare our students for success in whatever comes next. Explore our programs Home No matter where you are in your academic journey, we're here to help you plan your path. Our programs focus on experimentation, learning and discovery â there's no limit to how far you can go. We Are the School of Science and Engineering We welcome students from across the nation and around the world to join us in the pursuit of high-quality educational experiences and extracurricular activities that help shape the professionals they become. Academics Through our four academic divisions, we offer a variety of programs for undergraduate and graduate students, as well as kids still completing their K-12 education. Explore our programs Admissions We combine the personal touch of a small college with the student experience of a big university. Learn how to apply Affordability We have more than 125 scholarships reserved just for students in our programs.
